rows.name: text
rows.value:
This template demonstates 4 types of go-to buttons. 

Write x for the template example_emit.
rows.comments: A template is finished if it emits something, this can be completed or uncompleted.

rows.name: button_go_to_1
rows.comments: This returns to the current template after finishing example_emit

rows.name: button_go_to_2
rows.value: Go to x and don't come  back
rows.comments: This does not return to the current template after finishing example_emit

rows.name: button_go_to_3
rows.value: Go to x and come back if x uncompleted
rows.comments: This returns to the current template and completes the current template if it returns completed or does nothing if example_emit emits uncompleted

rows.name: button_go_to_4
rows.value: Go to x and come back if x completed.
rows.comments: This returns to the current template IF AND ONLY IF example_emit emits completed
